description: Situated in a small village in the Bassa Bresciana region, this restaurant comes as something of a surprise due to its focus on fish, with the selection of raw seafood options and the good-value-for-money tasting menu particular highlights. Personalised cuisine which is full of flavour, served in modern, convivial dining rooms.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
